includedAssets.title: Three Card Trick
includedAssets.synopsis: Failing to secure the annulment of the King's marriage to Katherine of Aragon, Cardinal Wolsey is banished from Court. His hopes of returning to the King's favour lie with the ever-loyal Thomas Cromwell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Failing to secure an annulment for the King, Cardinal Wolsey is banished. His hopes of returning lie with the ever-loyal Thomas Cromwell.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Failing to secure the annulment of the King's marriage to Katherine of Aragon, Cardinal Wolsey is banished from Court. His hopes of returning to the King's favour lie with the ever-loyal Thomas Cromwell.

includedAssets.title: Entirely Beloved
includedAssets.synopsis: Cardinal Wolsey has been forced to move to York. Cromwell stays in London, seeking to return Wolsey to the King's favour. As Cromwell's relationship with Henry deepens there is unexpected news from the north.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Cromwell seeks Wolsey's return to the King's favour, his relationship with Henry deepens. Meanwhile, news arrives from the north.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cardinal Wolsey has been forced to move to York. Cromwell stays in London, seeking to return Wolsey to the King's favour. As Cromwell's relationship with Henry deepens there is unexpected news from the north.

includedAssets.title: Anna Regina
includedAssets.synopsis: With the Cardinal now dead, it falls to Thomas Cromwell to orchestrate a marriage between the King and Anne Boleyn. He has the King's favour, but is being closely watched by his enemies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As his enemies watch closely, it falls to Thomas Cromwell to orchestrate a marriage between the King and Anne Boleyn.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With the Cardinal now dead, it falls to Thomas Cromwell to orchestrate a marriage between the King and Anne Boleyn. He has the King's favour, but is being closely watched by his enemies.

includedAssets.title: The Devil's Spit
includedAssets.synopsis: Anne gives birth to a girl, failing to produce Henry's longed-for male heir. Cromwell requires the nobility and church to swear an oath acknowledging Anne as lawful Queen. But will Thomas More agree?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Anne fails to produce Henry's longed-for male heir, Cromwell must persuade the nobility and church to accept her as lawful Queen.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Anne gives birth to a girl, failing to produce Henry's longed-for male heir. Cromwell requires the nobility and church to swear an oath acknowledging Anne as lawful Queen. But will Thomas More agree?

includedAssets.title: Crows
includedAssets.synopsis: With Anne pregnant again and away from court, Henry begins to take notice of Jane Seymour. Anne hears of this and demands loyalty of Cromwell. But has she overplayed her cards?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Anne pregnant again and away from court, Henry begins to take notice of Jane Seymour. Anne hears of this and demands Cromwell's loyalty.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Anne pregnant again and away from court, Henry begins to take notice of Jane Seymour. Anne hears of this and demands loyalty of Cromwell. But has she overplayed her cards?

includedAssets.title: Master Of Phantoms
includedAssets.synopsis: The king's love for Anne Boleyn has given way to anger and distrust and he instructs Cromwell to rid him of his second Queen. Sensing her loss of favour, Anne's enemies gather.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Henry's love for Anne has given way to anger and distrust as he instructs Cromwell to rid him of his second Queen.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The king's love for Anne Boleyn has given way to anger and distrust and he instructs Cromwell to rid him of his second Queen. Sensing her loss of favour, Anne's enemies gather.

includedAssets.title: Wolf Hall
includedAssets.synopsis: As he searches for a male heir and a means to annul his marriage, Henry VIII (Damian Lewis) begins to take notice of Thomas Cromwell (Mark Rylance), a servant of Cardinal Wolsey (Jonathan Pryce). Critically acclaimed adaptation of Hilary Mantel's award-winning novels.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Looking for a way to end his marriage, Henry VIII begins to take notice of Thomas Cromwell. Acclaimed drama starring Mark Rylance and Damian Lewis.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As he searches for a male heir and a means to annul his marriage, Henry VIII (Damian Lewis) begins to take notice of Thomas Cromwell (Mark Rylance), a servant of Cardinal Wolsey (Jonathan Pryce). Critically acclaimed adaptation of Hilary Mantel's award-winning novels.

includedIn.title: Wolf Hall
includedIn.shortSynopsis: As Henry VIII searches for a male heir and a means to annul his marriage, the unpredictable king begins to take notice of lawyer Thomas Cromwell.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: As Henry VIII searches for a male heir and a means to annul his marriage, the unpredictable king begins to take notice of lawyer Thomas Cromwell.

title: Wolf Hall
synopsis: As he searches for a male heir and a means to annul his marriage, Henry VIII (Damian Lewis) begins to take notice of Thomas Cromwell (Mark Rylance), a servant of Cardinal Wolsey (Jonathan Pryce). Critically acclaimed adaptation of Hilary Mantel's award-winning novels.
shortSynopsis: Looking for a way to end his marriage, Henry VIII begins to take notice of Thomas Cromwell. Acclaimed drama starring Mark Rylance and Damian Lewis.
mediumSynopsis: As he searches for a male heir and a means to annul his marriage, Henry VIII (Damian Lewis) begins to take notice of Thomas Cromwell (Mark Rylance), a servant of Cardinal Wolsey (Jonathan Pryce). Critically acclaimed adaptation of Hilary Mantel's award-winning novels.
